classScheduleInformation: CHBE 430 and CHBE 431 are approved for General Education credit only as a sequence. Both courses must be completed to receive Advanced Composition credit.
courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHBE 422; credit or concurrent registration in CHBE 424; senior standing in Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering.
description: Experiments and computation in fluid mechanics, heat transfer, mass transfer, and chemical reaction engineering. Exercises in effective Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering communications. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHBE 422; credit or concurrent registration in CHBE 424; senior standing in Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering.
label: Unit Operations Laboratory
